japanese_title: 兎が自ら歌った謡「サンパヤ テレケ」
japanese_translation:
(1) アマツポ(弩いしゆみ)すなわち「仕掛け弓」を仕掛ける事.
(2) 刀剣.これは戦争の時に使う刀剣とは違うので,ふだん家の右座の宝物の積んである上に吊してあるのがそれです.戦争の時には使いませんが,uniwente などのときには使います.
chinese_translation:
(1) アマツポ(弩いしゆみ),即「機關弓」的設置。
(2) 刀劍。此與戰爭時使用的刀劍不同,平時是吊在家中右座堆放寶物之處。戰爭時不會使用,但在 uniwente 等場合會使用。
english_translation: (1) Amatupo (弩いしゆみ), which is the installation of "mechanism bow". (2) Swords. These are different from the swords used in war. Usually, they are hung at the right seat where treasures are piled up at home. They are not used in war, but they are used in occasions such as uniwente.
comment: Translation from Chinese to English, based on Japanese footnotes about Ainu chants. Keeping original meaning and using simple English.
